summary: Team introductions and availability: Jordan (QA) is available for testing, PM is available to coordinate, Developer is available for development/implementation questions, and Mike (Architect) is available for architecture and design guidance.

actions.task: Coordinate upcoming work and notify QA (Jordan) when items are Ready for testing
Perform testing when notified that items are Ready for testing
Handle development and implementation questions raised by the team
Provide architecture and design guidance as needed

risks.risk: No meeting scheduled and no timelines agreed, which may lead to miscoordination or delayed testing/implementation.
risks.mitigation: PM to schedule a coordination meeting, define priorities and timelines, and ensure QA is notified when items are Ready for testing.
